title: How long should one stay at the same company in Silicon Valley? - Millionaire Lessons - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think there’s a specific time. You need to figure it out for yourself. Are you happy in your position? Are you fulfilled? Are you getting well compensated? Do you have other opportunities lined up? There are many factors why you should stay or leave a company. I don’t think that staying too long is one of the major reasons.
